examples.example: 人生漫漫征途，我们要有踏过三千坎坷仍积极向前的勇气。

translate.english: The long journey of life, we should have the courage to still move forward positively after going through three thousand frustrations.

examples.example: 面对生活中的种种挑战，我们要有勇往直前跨越三千阻碍的决心。

translate.english: Facing all kinds of challenges in life, we should have the determination to move forward bravely and cross three thousand obstacles.

examples.example: 我许下诺言，要陪你走过这三千繁华世界。

translate.english: I made a promise to accompany you through this prosperous world of three thousand.
